description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Copenhagen 2016
http://gotocph.com

Hadi Hariri - Kotlin Expert at JetBrains

ABSTRACT
Kotlin, a language developed by JetBrains for nearly 5 years is very close to its first release. However, did you know that it's being used in production for over a few years now already? Both inside and outside of JetBrains there are people deploying Kotlin applications for Android platform, for Web Applications and just about any other type of application. Why are people using it instead of Java or some of the other languages out there? [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/cph-2016/schedule

https://twitter.com/GOTOcph
https://www.facebook.com/GOTOConference

title: Kotlin - Ready for Production
